data.author: Pulkit Goel
data.quote: Even if you came last, you won over all those who feared to give it a try.

data.author: Masashi Kishimoto
data.quote: Where should I go: To Left where nothing is Right or to Right where nothing is Left.

data.author: Norman Vincent Peale
data.quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.

data.author: Karen Lamb
data.quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today.

data.author: Swami Vivekananda
data.quote: Talk to yourself everyday, or you may miss talking to someone great.

data.author: Bhagavad Gita
data.quote: The ignorant work for their own profit, the wise work for the welfare of the world, without thought for themselves.

data.author: Chanakya
data.quote: Once you start working on something, don’t be afraid of failure and don’t abandon it. People who work sincerely are the happiest.

data.author: Arjun
data.quote: The reason of my success is that I saw nothing else but the Bird's Eye

data.author: Chanakya
data.quote: As soon as the fear approaches near, attack and destroy it.

data.author: Wiiliam Shakespeare
data.quote: Cowards die many times before their deaths; The valiant never taste of death but once.

data.author: Pulkit Goel
data.quote: Fear the Fear

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious.

data.author: Carl Sagan
data.quote: Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were, but without it we go nowhere.

data.author: Frank Sinatra
data.quote: The best revenge is massive success.Frank Sinatra

data.author: Dalai Lama
data.quote: Happiness is not something readymade.  It comes from your own actions.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: Brain is like an Umbrella, works best when open.

data.author: Kabirdas
data.quote: Wherever you are is the entry point.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: The way get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

data.author: Marie Curie
data.quote: I was taught that the way of progress is neither swift nor easy.

data.author: Chanakya
data.quote: Learn from other men’s mistakes. You really do not have to touch the fire to see how hot it is!
